Text.Text:
It's fall and every leaf is
the perfect level of crunchy!

Using your arrow keys to navigate,
stand on top of a leaf and press
ENTER to stomp on it and
get points.

Tip: Picking up pinecones will
double the points you get from
leaves for a short time.
To pick up a pine cone
simply walk over it.

Get 100 points to win!


You can leave or activate this menu
again any time with your F1 key.
